alias_def.alt: Estado Libre Asociado de Puerto Rico
Virgin Islands of the United States

plugin.name: directed_offset
plugin.desc:
Calculates location given bearing and location.
Parameters:
distance (as double),
units (as esriUnits integer value),
bearing (decimal degrees angle, clockwise),
location (some location as IPropertySet)

plugin.name: calc_polygon_centroid
plugin.desc: Expects one parameter as a IGeometry object (polygon). Returns IGeometry (point) as a centroid of the passed polygon.

plugin.name: no_op
plugin.desc: No operation (does nothing) - returns value of the first parameter "as is"; other parameters ignored.

plugin.name: concatenate
plugin.desc: Converts all parameters to strings and returns concatenation of them.

plugin.name: interpolate
plugin.desc: Calculates address location along a polyline.

plugin.name: reverse_MGRS
plugin.desc: Reverse geocode location and return result as MGRS string

mapping_schema.name: SingleAddress

field.name: LocalityPreDir
field.desc: City or Place Directional Prefix (i.e. West Hollywood)

mapping_schema.selection_clause: <> '' AND <> ' ' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED STREET'
IS NOT NULL AND <> ' ' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED STREET'

mapping_schema.name: Nickel
mapping_schema.desc: Centerlines that contain single house ranges with side attribute

field.name: Parity
field.desc: Range parity (used primaily for indicating non-trivial parity cases)

mapping_schema.name: DIME
mapping_schema.desc: Centerlines that contain dual house ranges
mapping_schema.selection_clause: <> '' AND <> ' ' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED STREET'
IS NOT NULL AND <> ' ' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED' AND UPPER() <> 'UNNAMED STREET'

field.name: LocalityPreDir
field.desc: City or Place Directional Prefix (i.e. West Hollywood)

mapping_schema.name: USZIPPlus4
mapping_schema.desc: Point features containing US ZIP+4 codes.

mapping_schema.name: AdminPlaces
mapping_schema.desc: This can be used for City name databases.

field.name: NamedPlacePreDir
field.desc: City or Place Directional Prefix (i.e. West Hollywood)

mapping_schema.name: USZIPPlus4RangeBase
mapping_schema.desc: Point features containing US ZIP+4 codes.

mapping_schema.name: USZIPPlus4Range
mapping_schema.desc: Point features containing US ZIP+4 Range codes.

mapping_schema.name: State
mapping_schema.desc: This can be used for State name databases.
